format: html

## Load libraries

```{r}
library(DESeq2)
library(org.Hs.eg.db)
library(tibble)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(fgsea)
library(ggplot2)
library(reshape2)
library(ComplexHeatmap)
library(circlize)
library(clusterProfiler)
library(fgsea)
```

## Create a named vector

When you click the **Render** button a document will be generated that includes both content and the output of embedded code. You can embed code like this:

```{r echo=FALSE}
ranks <- results_dds_metab$stat
names(ranks) <- results_dds_metab$symbol
```

## Load the pathway (gene set) into a named list

```{r echo=FALSE}
pathways.kegg = gmtPathways("mysigdb/c2.cp.kegg_medicus.v2023.2.Hs.symbols.gmt")
pathways.gobp = gmtPathways("mysigdb/c5.go.bp.v2023.2.Hs.symbols.gmt")
pathways.reactome = gmtPathways("mysigdb/c2.cp.reactome.v2023.2.Hs.symbols.gmt")
```

The `echo: false` option disables the printing of code (only output is displayed).
